summary: The diff does not add the requested root-level README.md. Instead, it only modifies `project_state.json`, which is unrelated to the documentation-only BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create a top-level `README.md` at the repository root suitable for GitHub, in English, including: project overview; main pages/routes (`/`, `/detector`, `/risk-test`, `/report`, `/extension`); prerequisites (Node, pnpm, DFX); local dev steps for IC canister (`dfx start`, `dfx deploy`) and React dev server from `frontend/`; brief Internet Identity auth note; and export/download instructions referencing `frontend/scripts/export-source-code.sh`, `frontend/scripts/export-source-code.ps1`, `export/` output folder, and `frontend/SOURCE_CODE_EXPORT.md` copied as `README_EXPORT.md`.
missing_requirements.reason: No new `README.md` file is added at the repository root in the diff (Added files: none). Therefore none of the required README content/acceptance criteria can be verified as implemented.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified `project_state.json` project summary/features content unrelated to adding a GitHub-ready root `README.md`.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is documentation-only and specifically requests creating a new root `README.md` without other project changes; modifying `project_state.json` is not requested.
